solution_line_template: The chips cost ${chips_cost_per_bag} a bag and he buys them {days_per_week} days a week so that's {chips_cost_per_bag}*{days_per_week} = $<<{chips_cost_per_bag}*{days_per_week}={weekly_spending}>>{weekly_spending} a week
If he spends ${weekly_spending} on chips a week then over {num_weeks} weeks he will spend {weekly_spending}*{num_weeks} = $<<{weekly_spending}*{num_weeks}={total_spending}>>{total_spending} on chips
